ValidationRule.description: Amount_and_Currency_required IF True for pick list selection for Payment
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( (RecordTypeId = '01220000000JT7d'), (TEXT(Payment__c) <> "None"), OR ( ISBLANK( Currency__c ), ISBLANK( Amount__c )) )
||
AND( OR ( RecordTypeId = '01220000000JSYX', RecordTypeId = '01220000000646u', RecordTypeId = '01220000000646p', RecordTypeId = '01220000000JSYc', RecordTypeId = '01220000000JSsi' ), TEXT(Payment__c) <> "", OR ( ISBLANK( Currency__c ), ISBLANK( Amount__c )))
